import React from 'react'; function CartItem({ pizza, totalPrice, totalCount, onRemove, incCount, decCount }) { const deleteItem = (id) => { onRemove(pizza.id); }; const onIncCount = () => { incCount(pizza.id); }; const onDecCount = () => { decCount(pizza.id); }; return (

{pizza.title}

{totalCount}
{totalPrice} USD
Удалить
); } export default CartItem;
